summarized_info: I have created a calendar and plan to start daily morning exercises from today (May 12th), which include walking and Baduanjin.

title: Xiaocaiyuan Sowing Plan
description: In the afternoon, I sowed spinach seeds in the small vegetable garden on the balcony, eagerly awaiting their sprouting.
summarized_info: I have set a schedule to remind myself to sow spinach in the small vegetable garden this afternoon.

title: Please advise Chunmei on parenting issues.
description: I've made an appointment with Chunmei for afternoon tea to chat about our children's recent situations and exchange some parenting tips.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan set a schedule to meet with her childhood friend Liu Chunmei to seek advice on parenting.

title: The urgent embroidery order introduced by Zheng Xiuying.

title: Preparation of Reserve Funds for the High School Entrance Examination
description: Preparing emergency funds for my son Mingxuan's high school entrance examination. Tonight, I need to count out the first sum of money (target 500 yuan) and open a bank account tomorrow. This is the first step of implementation after the family meeting.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan set a task in her calendar, planning to count 500 yuan in cash on the evening of the 14th to prepare for opening a reserve fund account for the high school entrance examination at the bank the following day.

title: Start learning traffic regulations
description: After the children go to bed tonight, I will start studying the basic knowledge section of the "Road Traffic Safety Law" for the driving test's subject one.
summarized_info: I have scheduled to start studying traffic regulations tonight on my calendar, focusing on the basics of the "Road Traffic Safety Law."

title: Spring Garden Seedling Cultivation Begins
description: According to the plan, after completing the initial cleaning and soil loosening of the vegetable plot, spring vegetable seedling cultivation will commence. Seedlings for spring vegetables such as tomatoes and cucumbers will be started. Refer to the "Spring Care Guide for Home Vegetable Gardens."

description: After dinner, have a formal chat with Zhiqiang about the physical examination report and discuss how to adjust the family's diet going forward. Make sure to have his physical examination report ready as a reference.

title: Go to Aunt Wang Guilan's house to help out.
description: I'm going to Aunt Wang Guilan's house this afternoon to help out. She has some things that need to be organized and moved.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan plans to go to her neighbor Wang Guilan's house to help out on the afternoon of April 9th.

title: Silent Plan: Laundry
description: Execute the only major noisy household chore in the morning as planned. Ensure it is completed after the child goes to school or during the lunch break.

title: Apply for a family time deposit
description: Go to the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Jinghai Branch to handle a 3-year fixed deposit (30,000 yuan). This matter was decided after discussing with Zhiqiang last week, aiming to cope with inflation and preserve the value of family assets. It is necessary to bring an ID card and a bank card.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan set a schedule in her calendar to go to the bank on the afternoon of June 24th to handle a fixed deposit.

title: Community Craft Market Preparation
description: The community handicraft market at the end of the month requires the completion of the 'Abundance Year After Year' embroidery piece as the main exhibit. Today, I will embroider the scales of the carp.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan set January 9th in her calendar as the day to work on the embroidery for the market piece 'Abundance Year After Year'.

title: Sister Xiufen's Mobile Phone Teaching Appointment
description: My sister has arranged to come to my house this afternoon to systematically teach me how to use the various functions of my new phone, especially WeChat video calls and sending photos. Last time (March 10th), when she gave me the phone, she only gave a brief demonstration, so this time I want to learn in detail.
summarized_info: I have set a schedule to record that my sister is scheduled to come to my home on the afternoon of March 21st to systematically teach me how to use the new phone.

title: Family Financial Planning Meeting
description: In the evening, I discussed recent household income and expenses as well as future plans with my husband. Key topics: 1. Recent income from handmade crafts has been stable, and we decided to allocate the latest 500 yuan separately as a "reserve fund for our child's education." 2. Reviewed the current amount of the family's emergency fund.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan has set a schedule that involves family financial planning, including allocating 500 yuan from manual income as an education reserve fund.

title: Taking Care of Father Day
description: Spent the entire day at my parents' home taking care of my father, with activities including washing his body, changing clothes, and preparing soft meals for lunch (such as tomato and egg noodle soup). The process involved frequent bending and prolonged standing, which may lead to strain on the lower back.

description:
1. Deposit 50 yuan in cash saved from this month's living expenses into the family emergency fund envelope.  
2. Verify the utility bills for water, electricity, and gas.  
3. Check the status of the July handmade order income (expected to receive 200 yuan, which is also planned to be deposited into the emergency fund).

title:

Birthday
description: Birthday. Spent the entire day at the hospital taking care of my father, with high-intensity caregiving leaving me physically and mentally exhausted.

title: Family Finances: August Budget and Special Allocation
description:
Execute the August family budget draft. Key points:
1. Officially establish the "Mingxuan Boarding Special Fund" account.
2. Decide to allocate all July additional income (embroidery) to the "Mingxuan Boarding Fund."
3. Initiate "planned procurement" and the "envelope method" for managing daily expenses.
4. Check the implementation of water, electricity, and gas energy-saving measures.

title: Hospital Accompanying and Fatigue
description: Physical Condition: Fatigue has accumulated, and after finishing the leftover work at the office yesterday, I felt physically and mentally exhausted. I anticipate that accompanying my father tomorrow will be even more exhausting, and my condition may worsen.
summarized_info: Before going to bed, I recorded my awareness of the state of exhaustion and my concerns about tomorrow's caregiving duties.

title: Schedule Arrangement During Father's Hospitalization
description: September 11: Accompanied my mother throughout the day, handled hospital matters, and followed up on my father's treatment. Both energy and physical strength are severely depleted, with continuous weight loss and a concerning overall condition.
summarized_info: Arranged full-day hospital care tasks for the next two days and recorded concerns about ongoing declines in energy and weight.

title: Father admitted to the emergency room.
description: Father suddenly fell ill and was rushed to the hospital. Spent the entire day handling procedures, communicating with doctors, purchasing supplies, and arranging household matters. Extremely exhausted, barely slept.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan noted in the calendar that her father was admitted to the emergency department on September 10, along with the details of running around all day and experiencing sleep deprivation.

title: Accompanying father in the hospital all day.
description: I spent the entire day accompanying my father, Ma Jianguo, in the respiratory medicine ward of Jinghai District Hospital. From morning till night, I assisted with feeding, administering medication, bathing, reading the newspaper, took shifts with my mother, and handed over duties to my husband. Both physically and mentally exhausted, my eating and sleeping patterns were extremely irregular. I felt completely drained of energy.
summarized_info: Ma Xiulan set a schedule, recording her intense, round-the-clock care for her father in the hospital from September 11th to 12th, describing it as physically and mentally exhausting, with her energy completely drained.
